original_title: Q1 Tax Revenue in Sri Lanka spikes to Rs. 316 Billion
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Inland Revenue Department announced that a total of Rs. 316,619 Million was collected as Tax Revenue for the months of January, February and March 2023.
